# Atan
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Excel ATAN(number): Returns the inverse tangent of the given number in radians.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `ATAN`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
